subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Calvin Borel, a three-time Kentucky Derby-winning jockey, is still looking for a ride for the Derby but said he hoped to have one by race day.
snippet: Calvin Borel, a three-time Kentucky Derby-winning jockey, is still looking for a ride for the Derby but said he hoped to have one by race day.
